former Republican presidential candidate hit back yesterday over unflattering comments made by Mr Donald Rumsfeld in his new autobiography, Known and Unknown. Reviving a feud between the pair, Mr Donald Rumsfeld describes John McCain in his book as a man with a hair-trigger temper and a propensity to fashion and shift his positions to appeal to the media . John McCain , a fellow Republican, supported the Iraq war but argued for more US troops and resources. He said yesterday that he respected the former defence secretary but the pair had a" very,
